chargeHist.descr: Operate w/o Valid License (2nd w/in 3 yrs)

result.execSummary:
The defendant Wlises Lopez Cruz was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • No Valid License on Person. This is not a criminal offense and results only in a money penalty for this offense.

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: - Court grants the defendant 60 days to pay or call the Clerk of Courts Office (920-294-4142) to set-up a payment plan.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Wlises Lopez Cruz

records.addlTxt:
ADDRESS INFO for Wlises Lopez Cruz
Current: 2320 Elizabeth Ave, Zion, IL 60099 United States  (Effective: 04-14-2022)
Prior: 3602 Cty Rd K, Markesan, WI 53946 United States

10:59 AM Defendant Wlises Lopez Cruz in court.  Attorney Matthew Steven McElroy in court for State of Wisconsin. Court calls 2022CM13 - Statement by ADA - defendant has a valid temporary Illinois license. ADA McElroy moves to amend count 2 to No Valid license on person with a forfeiture and costs and count 1 will be dismissed and read-in. Defendant enters a plea of No Contest to the amended charge. Court finds the defendant guilty on the amended charge on count 2. Court orders count 1 be dismissed and read-in.

Court sentences the defendant to:

-$50 forfeiture plus costs. Court grants the defendant 60 days to pay or call the Clerk of Courts Office (920-294-4142) to set-up a payment plan. 

Statement by ADA, the defendant also has another case 2021CT141 and requests this case be dismissed and read-in. So ordered by the Court.

Court adjourned at 11:01 AM
Status hearing on March 23, 2022 at 10:30 am.

ADDRESS INFO for Wlises Lopez Cruz
Current: 3602 Cty Rd K, Markesan, WI 53946 United States  (Effective: 02-16-2022)
Prior: 145 N Wisconsin St, Berlin, WI 53923
Defendant is to complete processing with the Green Lake County Sheriff's Department.
Defendant is to complete processing with the Green Lake County Sheriff's Department.

10:38 AM Defendant Wlises Lopez Cruz appeared in court, Attorney Gerise Laspisa appeared in court for State of Wisconsin. Short discussion before going on the record - def has a valid IL DL. Defendant confirms receipt of the criminal complaint and waives reading. Court instructs the defendant of the maximum penalty on each count. Court finds probable cause. Court instructs the defendant of his/her right to an attorney. Court enters NOT GUILTY pleas on both counts. DA makes bond recommendation. Statement by defendant. Court instructs def he has to apply to the public defender's office for each no case. Court sets bond at $500 signature bond and conditions of: Defendant is to complete processing with the Green Lake County Sheriff's Department.  Court will set for Status Hearing on March 23, 2022 at 10:30 AM.

Court adjourned at 10:40 AM.
